queryDbListDevice: SELECT DeviceId FROM [HDA].[dbo].[KyoKFSDevice] a with (nolock) Inner join KyoKFSGroups b with (nolock) on a.GroupId = b.GroupId Inner join KyoKFSGroups d with (nolock) on b.OriginGroupId = d.GroupId where manufacturer in ('Kyocera', 'KYOCERA');
queryDbListDeviceTop: SELECT TOP 100 DeviceId FROM [HDA].[dbo].[KyoKFSDevice] a WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN KyoKFSGroups b WITH (NOLOCK) ON a.GroupId = b.GroupId INNER JOIN KyoKFSGroups d WITH (NOLOCK) ON b.OriginGroupId = d.GroupId WHERE manufacturer IN ('Kyocera', 'KYOCERA');
queryDbListDeviceSmall: select distinct c.groupName 'Origin Group' , a.serialNumber ,a.DeviceId , case a.managementStatus when 1 then 'Gestita' when 2 then 'Monitorata' when 3 then 'Archiviata' end as Tipo_Gestione , case (a.devicestatus) when 1 then 'Ready' when 2 then 'Warning' when 3 then 'Error' when 4 then 'Offline' when 5 then 'Monitoring' end as 'Stato' ,IIF(a.[color]=0, 'BW', 'COLOR') 'Machine Type' , count(a.deviceid) 'MIF' , convert(varchar,year(a.lastupdate)) + '_' + convert(varchar,month(a.lastupdate)) from kyokfsdevice a with (nolock) inner join KyoKFSGroups b with (nolock) on a.GroupId = b.GroupId inner join KyoKFSGroups c with (nolock) on b.OriginGroupId = c.GroupId where a.manufacturer in ('KYOCERA', 'Kyocera', 'kyocera') and a.managementstatus not in ('3') and a.deviceStatus not in ('4') and c.GroupId in ('C2UV5SA', '0MVVDCD','C2U5DCB') group by c.groupName, a.managementStatus, a.COLOR, a.devicestatus, a.lastupdate, a.serialNumber,a.DeviceId order by [Origin Group] asc
